title: Of Cookies & Coffee
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IcCFZh

by colorworld

“Can I take a sip?” Clara inquires curiously, smelling the intensity of the hot drink.

“Mmmm I dunno. It’s pretty bad for you and you most likely won’t like it,” Tony explains.

“Then why do you drink it?” Clara raises her chocolatey brows. The sunlight is starting to illuminate her auburn hair.

“Because I’m a weird person who wants caffeine to keep him alive in the morning.” The father then sighs and hands his daughter the mug.

summary: Guys I'm tired and sleep deprived but hear me out: what if, even if you couldn't lift Mjolnir before, you can still get to a...
body:
Guys I’m tired and sleep deprived but hear me out: what if, even if you couldn’t lift Mjolnir before, you can still get to a point where you can lift it with enough personal development.

Maybe in Age Of Ultron, Tony couldn’t lift it because of the fear clouding his judgement at the time. And in Civil War, Steve wouldn’t be able to lift it anymore because of how he let his anger cloud HIS judgement and nearly killed a man he once called his friend over it.

Later on, in Endgame, before his final moments, Tony can lift Mjolnir from the second he decides to sacrifice everything to help his friends get everyone back, and no you can’t change my mind.

summary: Turns Out, I Have a Rose Garden
title: Turns Out, I Have a Rose Garden
body:
by betheflame

President Steven Grant Rogers was gearing up to run for president again and he had yet to deliver on his major campaign promise from the first term: reverse the effects of climate change by at least 40%. Luckily for him, billionaire genius inventor Tony Stark had just the technology to do it.

Less luckily for Steve, he was totally into Tony, who had no idea Steve was gay because essentially no one knew Steve was gay. If Steve has to choose between a second crack at the office or a first crack at true love, which one wins?

+++++++

The “American President” re-telling no one was asking for (except my subconscious), where Steve is President and Tony is … well… himself.

Thanks to Aaron Sorkin for some of the dialogue and the general inspiration and to all of these yahoos for being so much fun to muck around with.

blog.description: Veronica. 28. The Bronx (NYC). Your local big dumb Aquarius INTP bi. BU Alum. Somehow finished law school. Cat and video game enthusiast. Mainly Achievement Hunter/RT, Marvel, Buzzfeed Unsolved and McElroy content. Don't worry, I tag my posts. Same username Ao3.

title: Late Night Solution
body:
For @stony-week Day 4 - Superfamily

When baby Peter wakes up fussy and crying, Steve looks for an answer. Tony may have already found it.

*****

Steve woke up to a small cry on the baby monitor. He lowered the volume to let Tony continue to sleep, turning in bed to look at the video. Nothing seemed wrong, just Peter fussing in his crib. He gave it a couple of minutes to see if Peter would fall back asleep. But the crying continued, so Steve quietly slipped out of bed and walked down the hall to Peter’s room.

Steve walked into the room, turned on the lamp by the crib and picked up Peter. The diaper didn’t need to be changed. Peter didn’t feel warm. But Steve still couldn’t figure out what was wrong.

“JARVIS, is there something I’m missing? Is Peter sick?” Steve whispered.

Read the rest on Ao3 –>

summary: To the surprise of the entire group of Avengers, Y/N Stark had discovered a powerful part of herself passed down to her from her late mother during childbirth.

—

This was it.

Despite the gauntlet being tossed around the battlefield, like the Avengers were playing a game of Hot Potato,

Despite Spider-Man protecting it by going into “instant kill mode” for the very first time,

And Despite every woman rushing to Peter on the battlefield to help him protect it,

Thanos got the gauntlet. Again.

He slipped it onto his right hand, admiring the infinity stones that laid upon it, and looked over to the heroes with a big ugly smirk on his big ugly purple ballsack of a face.

“Y/N I don’t think that’s the best way to tell her the story..”

“But Pepperrrrr! If I don’t tell it that way, how will I hear her giggle?”

“She’s not wrong.”

“..Tony!”

“Alright, alright. I’m taking over!”

Just as Thanos, the big purple evil meanie, was about to snap his fingers to erase the universe again, the great and all powerful Iron Man attacked him with one last distraction, his last at least, and successfully stole the six infinity stones.

He placed all six onto his own hand and just as he was about to snap, another distraction! But this time, the “distraction” didn’t just catch the attention of Thanos and Iron Man, but the entire battlefield!

“What was it daddy?”

A beacon of light! The brightest white you could’ve ever seen, but somehow that light only blinded the bad ugly alien people that looked at it. Because what, or who I saw in the middle of the light, floating in the air with her eyes and clothes turning into a bright white, was Y/N!

As she floated down, her bare feet touching the ground again, she raised her hand towards the infinity stones and they all came flying towards her! They landed in perfect rainbow order upon her golden tiara.

“A tiara?!”

“Yeah! Think of it as the one Wonder Woman wears.”

“Cool!”

Once the infinity stones placed themselves on the tiara, Y/N’s eyes glowing all the colors of the rainbow, she raised her right hand saying “This ends now,” and then snapped. Every member of Thanos’ army begun to turn to dust. All the creatures, all the remains of his ship, everything evil.

Thanos sat defeated as he waited for his death.

But it didn’t come.

“Did you really think, after everything, I would let you go so easily? So painlessly? After all the pain you caused?” Thanos was shocked at the mercilessness of this girl who seemed to be normal. She wasn’t. There was a power within her that he recognized, and as he recognized it, he begun to beg for mercy.

“No. You don’t deserve mercy.” Y/N raised her hand again, but this time, she made a fist. Suddenly, Thanos’ organs begun to crush within him. He screamed in agony. But then she stopped.

“Did you really expect me to kill you? Wrong again. Trust me when I say you’ll die by the hands of the person you’ve hurt the most.” She made a hand gesture and Nebula stood before him, holding two katana swords. “This is for all the pain you caused. YOU KILLED MY SISTER! And now, I’m going to kill you.”

“Okay now I see how this story probably wasn’t the best to tell her before bed…”

“But daddyyyyy I like this story!”

“Alright squirt. But you’re going to bed right after this!”

“Or we’ll sell all your toys!”

Nebula, the blue meanie, chopped his head clean off, just like Uncle Thor did the first time. And that was the end. Y/N used the infinity stones to restore the earth of its former glory and then parted ways with six stones, placing them in the box that would later be used to return them to the right place in time.

As the dust settled, another beam of light! It pulled Y/N up again and in an echoey voice she said, “I am the Sentinel, a backstop given the power to wield infinity stones from my mother to protect the galaxies.”

Y/N fell to the ground and was so exhausted that she didn’t wake up until two months later!

“Daddy do i get powers from mommy too?”

“Well-”

“-You get a different kind of power from mommy because we have different mommies. You’ll find out what it is when you’re older.”

“Yay!”

And that’s the story about how Y/N Stark, and the Avengers, saved the galaxies.

The End.

—

bonus:

“What was your favorite part of the story Morgan?”

“I like the part when all the women teamed up to protect the gauntlet! Or when Auntie Carol flew right through the big ship and destroyed it!”

“Yeah me too. We know some pretty strong women. Maybe we’ll be just like them when we’re older.”

“Oh! Can we daddy?!”

“Whatever you want to be, my girls.”

Steve pauses at the door, looking in.

No, he has to stop this from happening ever again. He leaves, going to tell the others.

Peter blushes and smiles, standing and kissing Tony’s cheek. “My throat hurts now, thanks for that.” Peter rasps, voice destroyed.

Tony growls and kisses him, marking his neck. “How do you want me to finish you off?” He asks.

Peter blushes and thinks for a moment. “Um… will you eat me out?”

Tony smirks happily. “Only if you kiss me first.”

Tony walks up with Peter, talking about what they were doing in the lab. “And so I think you were right, the formula would be better if we-“ he grunts, being pushed against the wall.

Peter gasps and steps forward. “Steve?!”

“Use your words big guy, no need for this.” Tony tries.

Thor steps closer. “You are a bad man.”

Peter steps closer again. “Steve, stop it! What’s going on?”

“I saw him hurt you, Peter.” He says.

Peter blinks. “What?”

“He saw Stark force you to do sexual activities in order to have access to his lab.” Thor says.

Tony bursts out laughing, holding onto Steve’s arm that’s till around his throat.

Peter can’t help but groan, face bright red. “I so told you, Tony! I told you we should make the windows into the lab dark!”

Thor blinks. “Wait, What?”

Tony chuckles and pats Steve’s arm. “It wasn’t real. I didn’t force him.”

Steve loosens his grip and looks to Peter.

Peter blushes and nods. “I’m s-sorry for all of the trouble, Mr. Thor and Mr. Rogers. I um… I asked for him to… to do this…”

“Oh.” Thor says. “Like a sexual fantasy type thing?” He asks.

Peter blushes red and nods. “I’m so sorry this scared you, I’m so sorry.”

Steve Let’s Tony go. “You’re 16. You’re underage.”

Thor places a hand on Steve’s shoulder. “My friend, sometimes it’s important to recognize that the law is not always equal with just or morally correct.”

“It’s not just the law! Peter is too young, anyone would-“

“‘Anyone’ would say my own relationship with my brother is wrong. It matters not. If the Spiderling is consenting, it is not out business.”

Tony smirks and is about to make a smart ass retort when Peter rushes past him, hugging Thor. “Thank you, Thor. For saying that for me. I was so scared everyone would call me a gold-digging whore or something. I’m really really glad that you don’t think that.”

Thor blinks and hugs him back. “Even if you were, it is not my business. Of course I support you, little one.”

Peter blushes red and pulls back. “Th-Thank you.” He says.

Steve sighs. “Fine. You have to tell Pepper.”

Tony pales. “Can we go back to you killing me instead?”

title: Cold Showers, colder nights
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2MF8kqn

by The_silent_smile

On good nights my arms are around her and her head rests on my chest.

On bad once she sleeps on the couch or curled up under the large blanket alone while I stumble towards and hide in the only place know that will calm my mind by simply being there: the lab.

On the worst once, she comes down there, a frown carving into her flawless skin and eyes dark with worry.

Words: 960, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 7 of The not-so-happy life of Anthony Edward Stark
